titles: The seaman and souldiers last farwel to their dearest jewels. He must be gone, the fates have so decreed ... The tune is, I am so deep in love, or, Cupids courtesie.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere. R. Gilbertson and I. Wright.,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
